title: Chaos Rehearsals
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about handicap accessibility, a passenger ferry in Germany that got crushed by a wave, Patton's recent TV addiction, and more! Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a message a speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.

You and your cat are going to LOVE Cat Person as much as we do! Go to CatPerson.com/TEXT and use code TEXT to save nearly 50% on your Starter Box with free shipping. 

Right now it's time to reclaim your health and arm your immune system with convenient, daily nutrition. To make it easy, Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/text.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
